fields.name: Polar Bear Habitat - Engage users
fields.description:
The Canadian Polar Bear Habitat is known around the world for its polar bear research and
education. However, its remote location limits the number of students, teachers, and life-long
learners that it can reach. In order to connect with more people — and boost its impact — the
Habitat would like to be able to deliver a virtual experience. This could include things like
handouts, interactive activities and graphics, videos, virtual tours, and quizzes — as long as
the user is engaged and can navigate the experience with ease. Here is a dropbox folder with
additional information and images that you can consult to better understand our challenge
and build your project! Our website is always there for you to visit as well! Good Luck :))

fields.name: TechAide
fields.description:
Centraide is one of the largest investors in the community sector. Each year, Centraide
organizes a fundraising campaign to help with our mission to end poverty and social isolation.
Although our fundraising results have increased in the last years, we are struggling to attract
young donors. As our more generous donors head into retirement, it will be important to
recruit young donors to insure income stability. Your goal is to come up with an innovative
solution that can help us attract more donors, especially the younger generation. You can
check out our website to learn more about what we do. Here is some data that you can use to
build your project. Thanks!
